text: avan (phir'aun) parannu: nan ninnalkk anuvadam tarunnatin mumpayi ninnal avanil ‍visvasiccuvennea? tirccayayum ivan ninnalkk jalavidya pathippicca ninnalute talavan tanneyan valiye ninnal arinnu keallum tirccayayum ninnalute kaikalum, ninnalute kalukalum etir ‍vasannalilninnayikkeant nan muriccu kalayukayum, ninnale muluvan nan krusikkukayum ceyyunnatan‌
